ARd.caption: NFT Contract Address
ARd.doc: The ERC-1155 NFT contract address of the NFT you are transferring.
ARd.name: nft_contract_address

ARe.caption: RPC URL
ARe.doc: Provide a RPC url  for the network this NFT smart contracts deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
ARe.name: default_provider

ARf.caption: To Address
ARf.doc: The wallet address that is receiving this NFT.
ARf.name: to_address

ARg.caption: Token ID
ARg.doc: The token ID of the NFT being transferred.
ARg.name: token_id

ARh.caption: Quantity
ARh.doc: The quantity of NFTs being transferred.
ARh.name: quantity
